Questions: Why can't I log in to my account?
Why can't I create a new account?
Why can't I add a new bank account?
Why can't I view my transaction history?
Why can't I set up recurring payments?
Why can't I close my account?
Scenarios: User is unable to log in due to incorrect password
User is unable to create an account due to invalid information
User is unable to add a bank account due to incorrect bank details
User is unable to transfer money due to insufficient funds
User is unable to view transaction history due to server error
User is unable to set up recurring payments due to invalid payment details
User is unable to close account due to pending transactions
